full_text: Fwd: OTP By Telephone w/SDNY at MCC-NY; on 08/08/19 From To Date 2019/08/07 17:20 Subject: Fwd: OTP By Telephone w/SDNY at MCC-NY; on 08/08/19 Attachments: TEXT.htm, IMAGE.png, CCS - rescheduling notice changing conference from 8_9_19 to 8_8_19.PDF Do you mind calling attorney conference in the morning and reminding them to hold room 3 open for 10:00 AM? and Epstein will likely have an attorney visit, but we need room 3 open for this hearing. If they have to keep Room 3 closed from 8:00 to 10:00 to ensure it is available, then that's what we have to do. this is an federal civil case out of SDNY so we should accommodate.) Thanks!! Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 f: 646-836-7665 >>> 8/2/2019 1:12 PM >>> Please produce inmate telephonically on Thursday, August 8, 2019, at 10:00 am. Please have him go to attorney conference in advance of the hearing. At the appointed time, please call Honorable Judge Steven Weissman via (914) 390 Legal will arrange with attorney conference for attorney conference room 3 to be available at the appointed time. Thank you. CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 (P) 646-836 (F) 646-836-7665 @barclaydamon.com> 8/2/2019 10:23 AM >>> Good morning Please be advised that this telephone conference has been rescheduled for August 8, 2019 at Page 15492 DOJ-OGR-00024006

Do you mind calling attorney conference in the morning and reminding them to hold room 3 open for 10:00 AM? and Epstein will likely have an attorney visit, but we need room 3 open for this hearing. If they have to keep Room 3 closed from 8:00 to 10:00 to ensure it is available, then that's what we have to do. this is an federal civil case out of SDNY so we should accommodate.) Thanks!!
